messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] William Sears?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/6/02 7:45:58 PM Central Daylight Time, ... I thought the other one was William Sears and an article he wrote at an attachment parenting
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/6/02 7:45:58 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> > Sometime either today or yesterday, someone wrote a post
> discussing
> > Christianity and referred to two different men's names. One
> was Ezzo and I
> > think the other started with an F.

I thought the other one was William Sears and an article he wrote at an
attachment parenting website about discipline was mentioned too, I think.

~Ellen

instruction have not yet entirely strangled the holy curiousity of inquiry;

of freedom."
